name: Republic of China
startIntroPart1: Welcome Generalismo Chiang Kai-shek, you lead the Republic of China
startIntroPart2: My fellow countrymen, the time for division is at an end. For too long, our nation has been beset by chaos and strife. But now, we stand united under one flag, ready to forge a new destiny! Our enemies, whether from without or from within, will soon learn that the spirit of the Chinese people cannot be broken. We shall build a republic that is not only mighty in its armies, but glorious in its culture and unyielding in its resolve. Will our new nation stand firm against all who would see us fall? The world will soon see that the Republic of China is here to prevail!
declaringWar: You are a relic of a bygone era. This land belongs to a new, unified China, and your existence stands in the way of our destiny. You will be erased from history
attacked: Your arrogance is an insult to our people. The Republic will prove its resolve on the battlefield, and your nation will be nothing more than a footnote in the pages of our ascendancy.
defeated: This is not the end. I may have fallen, but the spirit of our nation will not be extinguished. Mark my words: a new China will emerge from the ashes of this defeat.
introduction: Greetings. I am Chiang Kai-shek, leader of the Republic of China. Our nation has risen to forge a new destiny, and we are ready to find our place among the powers of this world.
neutralHello: We have business to discuss. Speak your mind.
hateHello: I have no patience for your deceit. State your intentions and be gone.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, i hope we can cooperate more in the future.
tradeRequest: Our nations have needs that can be met through cooperation. What would it take to secure a fair exchange between us?
